name: Choline Chloride 50%
desc: Choline Chloride 50% is an organic chemical compound that is necessary in the body for the proper functioning of the liver and for the synthesis of acetylcholine. It is obtained by spraying and thoroughly mixing aqueous choline chloride on a silica support.
techs: Choline Chloride 50% occurs in a form of a fine loose granular powder of white color. It has a light, characteristic smell of choline.
shelf: The shelf life of Choline Chloride 50% is 24 months when stored in closed bags at room temperature. Bags should be kept tightly closed and protected against moisture, use immediately.
packaging: Foodcom supplies its Business Partners with Choline Chloride 50% in 25 kg bags and in Big bags.
applications: Choline Chloride 50% is used as an ingredient in premix feed, food supplement for farm animals and compound feed. Choline Chloride 50% is known for its properties of supporting the immune system of animals, increasing fertility, accelerating weight gain (especially in cattle and poultry) and improving the quality of litter eggs.
